speaker: Promoter
lines: You enter the promoter's office and see a ledger on the desk.
He oils the bell rope and looks you over.
'We keep the matches moving,' he says.
He weighs your token in his hand.
'There are arrangements if you want them,' he adds.
He closes a drawer and waits for your answer.
He stamps your wrist for access to the tunnel.

choices.text: Gamble your purse on a promise.
